name: Phone VR Drone Sim
description:
VR Drone Sim

It takes forever to load, I recommend reading the instructions as you wait!

Controls (Keyboard)/Controller:

  • (Q/E)/Left Stick X: Tilt Side to Side
  • (W/S)/Left Stick Y:Tilt Forward/Back
  • (A/D)/Right Stick X: Turn
  • (Space/Shift)Right Stick Y: Altitude Controls
  • (F)/Left Trigger: Reduce Motor power
  • (R)/Left Bumper: Reset
  • (Z)/Right Trigger: Slo-Motion
  • (X)/Right Bumper: Change Camera Mode
  • (Left/Right Arrow)/DPad Left/Right: Zoom (FOV)
  • (Down Arrow/)DPad Down: Set still camera position
  • (V)/X: Toggle Velocity Assistance
  • (C)/Y: Toggle Velocity and Propellor Info
  • (Enter)/A: Toggle VR
  • (ESC)/B: Reset FOV

How to setup steam remote play (all you need is a phone with steam link):

  1. Add your browser to steam as a non-steam game
  2. connect to your computer with your phone in the steam link app
  3. ALT+TAB till you're in your browser
  4. Fullscreen

It may work standalone on some phones with controller support, I have no idea.
